IntegerParameter.Name: sw_flag
IntegerParameter.Description: NR version: 0 is v1.0; 1 is v1.1

FixedPointParameter.Name: atten_factor_min_val
FixedPointParameter.Description: Minimum value of attenuation factor. (Class I)

FixedPointParameter.Name: ov_est_fac_band_no_zero
FixedPointParameter.Description: Overestimation factor for all bands except band 0. (Class I)

IntegerParameter.Name: nr_shl_ri
IntegerParameter.Description: Number of left shifts in noise reduction averaging low-pass for rising signals. (Class II)

IntegerParameter.Name: nr_shl_fa
IntegerParameter.Description: Number of left shifts in noise reduction averaging low-pass for falling signals. (Class II)

IntegerParameter.Name: min_stat_len
IntegerParameter.Description: Window length of minimum statistics (number of SB samples, 16 or 32 SB). (Class II)

FixedPointParameter.Name: atte_ratio
FixedPointParameter.Description: Attenuation from one SB to the following SB to consider masking in frequency direction. (Class II)

FixedPointParameter.Name: correction_value
FixedPointParameter.Description: Correction value for background noise measurement. (Class II)

FixedPointParameter.Name: thresh_spe_act
FixedPointParameter.Description: Threshold for speech activity decision, triggers increase or reduction of noise level enhancement (to avoid musical tones). (Class II)

FixedPointParameter.Name: noise_lev_enhanc_max
FixedPointParameter.Description: Maximum value of noise level enhancement. (Class II)

FixedPointParameter.Name: noise_lev_enhanc_min
FixedPointParameter.Description: Minimum value of noise level enhancement. (Class II)

FixedPointParameter.Name: noise_lev_enhanc_incre_no_sp
FixedPointParameter.Description: Threshold increment of noise level enhancement (no speech activity). (Class II)

FixedPointParameter.Name: noise_lev_enhanc_incre_sp
FixedPointParameter.Description: Threshold decrement of noise level enhancement (speech activity). (Class II)

FixedPointParameter.Name: agc_thresh_abs
FixedPointParameter.Description: Absolute threshold for AGC update. (Class II)

FixedPointParameter.Name: agc_thresh_rel
FixedPointParameter.Description: Relative threshold (distance to noise level) for AGC update. (Class II)

FixedPointParameter.Name: gain_factor
FixedPointParameter.Description: Exponent factor of the NR V1.1 gain. (Class II)

FixedPointParameter.Name: gain_limit
FixedPointParameter.Description: Maximum gain limit of the NR V1.1 gain. (Class II)
